title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when select the dataset.
SR: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column name when selecting the dataset. Description: Setting an alias for a column in a data set does not update the column name displayed in the expression builder when selecting the dataset. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and try to select the dataset. The old column name instead of the alias is displayed.
